Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class GameMap

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GameMap
Direct Known Subclasses:
CliGameMap, GuiMap
public abstract class GameMap
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class of the game map, extended by CliGameMap and GuiMap, that uses these common methods and attributes

    • setPossibleDst

      public void setPossibleDst​(java.util.Set<Coordinates> possibleDstBuilder1, java.util.Set<Coordinates> possibleDstBuilder2)
      Sets a possible destination set for each of the owned builders. Arguments can be null.
      Parameters:
      possibleDstBuilder1 - Set of possible destinations for builder 1
      possibleDstBuilder2 - Set of possible destinations for builder 2

    • setChosenBuilderNum

      public void setChosenBuilderNum​(int chosenBuilderNumber)
      Selects a builder.
      Parameters:
      chosenBuilderNumber - number indicating which builder we want to select: 0: no builder 1: builder number 1 2: builder number 2

    • modifyHeight

      public void modifyHeight​(Coordinates coord, boolean dome)
      increment height of the specified cell. If dome is true it sets the height to DOME
      Parameters:
      coord - position whose height will be modified
      dome - indicates if a dome will be placed at position coord
